verses.verse: Unto the<WG3588> angel<WG32> of the<WG3588> church<WG1577> of Ephesus<WG2179> write;<WG1125> These things<WG3592> saith<WG3004> he that holdeth<WG2902> the<WG3588> seven<WG2033> stars<WG792> in<WG1722> his<WG848> right hand<WG1188> who walketh<WG4043> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the<WG3588> seven<WG2033> golden<WG5552> candlesticks; <WG3087>

I know<WG1492> thy<WG4675> works,<WG2041> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> labor,<WG2873> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> patience,<WG5281> and<WG2532> how<WG3754> thou canst<WG1410> not<WG3756> bear<WG941> them which are evil: <WG2556> and<WG2532> thou hast tried<WG3985> them which say<WG5335> they are<WG1511> apostles,<WG652> and<WG2532> are<WG1526> not,<WG3756> and<WG2532> hast found<WG2147> them<WG846> liars: <WG5571>

And <WG2532> hast borne,<WG941> and<WG2532> hast<WG2192> patience,<WG5281> and<WG2532> for my name's sake <WG1223> <WG3450> <WG3686> hast labored,<WG2872> and<WG2532> hast not<WG3756> fainted. <WG2577>
Nevertheless <WG235> I have<WG2192> somewhat against<WG2596> thee,<WG4675> because<WG3754> thou hast left<WG863> thy<WG4675> first<WG4413> love. <WG26>

Remember <WG3421> therefore<WG3767> from whence<WG4159> thou art fallen,<WG1601> and<WG2532> repent,<WG3340> and<WG2532> do<WG4160> the<WG3588> first<WG4413> works;<WG2041> or else<WG1490> I will come<WG2064> unto thee<WG4671> quickly,<WG5034> and<WG2532> will remove<WG2795> thy<WG4675> candlestick<WG3087> out of<WG1537> his<WG848> place,<WG5117> except<WG3362> thou repent. <WG3340>
But <WG235> this<WG5124> thou hast,<WG2192> that<WG3754> thou hatest<WG3404> the<WG3588> deeds<WG2041> of the<WG3588> Nicolaitanes,<WG3531> which<WG3739> I also<WG2504> hate. <WG3404>

He that hath<WG2192> an ear,<WG3775> let him hear<WG191> what<WG5101> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> saith<WG3004> unto the<WG3588> churches;<WG1577> To him<WG846> that overcometh<WG3528> will I give<WG1325> to eat<WG5315> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> tree<WG3586> of life,<WG2222> which<WG3739> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the<WG3588> paradise<WG3857> of God. <WG2316>

And <WG2532> unto the<WG3588> angel<WG32> of the<WG3588> church<WG1577> in Smyrna<WG4668> write;<WG1125> These things<WG3592> saith<WG3004> the<WG3588> first<WG4413> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> last,<WG2078> which<WG3739> was<WG1096> dead,<WG3498> and<WG2532> is alive; <WG2198>

I know<WG1492> thy<WG4675> works,<WG2041> and<WG2532> tribulation,<WG2347> and<WG2532> poverty,<WG4432> (but<WG1161> thou art<WG1488> rich)<WG4145> and<WG2532> I know the<WG3588> blasphemy<WG988> of them which say<WG3004> they<WG1438> are<WG1511> Jews,<WG2453> and<WG2532> are<WG1526> not,<WG3756> but<WG235> are the synagogue<WG4864> of Satan. <WG4567>

Fear <WG5399> none<WG3367> of those things which<WG3739> thou shalt<WG3195> suffer: <WG3958> behold,<WG2400> the<WG3588> devil<WG1228> shall<WG3195> cast<WG906> some of<WG1537> you<WG5216> into<WG1519> prison,<WG5438> that<WG2443> ye may be tried;<WG3985> and<WG2532> ye shall have<WG2192> tribulation<WG2347> ten<WG1176> days;<WG2250> be<WG1096> thou faithful<WG4103> unto<WG891> death,<WG2288> and<WG2532> I will give<WG1325> thee<WG4671> a crown<WG4735> of life. <WG2222>

He that hath<WG2192> an ear,<WG3775> let him hear<WG191> what<WG5101> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> saith<WG3004> unto the<WG3588> churches;<WG1577> He that overcometh<WG3528> shall not<WG3364> be hurt<WG91> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> death. <WG2288>

And <WG2532> to the<WG3588> angel<WG32> of the<WG3588> church<WG1577> in<WG1722> Pergamos<WG4010> write;<WG1125> These things<WG3592> saith<WG3004> he which hath<WG2192> the<WG3588> sharp<WG3691> sword<WG4501> with two edges; <WG1366>

I know<WG1492> thy<WG4675> works,<WG2041> and<WG2532> where<WG4226> thou dwellest,<WG2730> even where<WG3699> Satan's<WG4567> seat<WG2362> is: and<WG2532> thou holdest fast<WG2902> my<WG3450> name,<WG3686> and<WG2532> hast not<WG3756> denied<WG720> my<WG3450> faith,<WG4102> even<WG2532> in<WG1722> those days<WG2250> wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> Antipas <WG493> was my<WG3450> faithful<WG4103> martyr,<WG3144> who<WG3739> was slain<WG615> among<WG3844> you,<WG5213> where<WG3699> Satan<WG4567> dwelleth. <WG2730>

But <WG235> I have<WG2192> a few things<WG3641> against<WG2596> thee,<WG4675> because<WG3754> thou hast<WG2192> there<WG1563> them that hold<WG2902> the<WG3588> doctrine<WG1322> of Balaam,<WG903> who<WG3739> taught<WG1321> Balac<WG904> to cast<WG906> a stumblingblock<WG4625> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> children<WG5207> of Israel,<WG2474> to eat<WG5315> things sacrificed unto idols,<WG1494> and<WG2532> to commit fornication. <WG4203>
So <WG3779> hast<WG2192> thou<WG4771> also<WG2532> them that hold<WG2902> the<WG3588> doctrine<WG1322> of the<WG3588> Nicolaitanes,<WG3531> which thing<WG3739> I hate. <WG3404>

Repent; <WG3340> or else<WG1490> I will come<WG2064> unto thee<WG4671> quickly,<WG5035> and<WG2532> will fight<WG4170> against<WG3326> them<WG846> with<WG1722> the<WG3588> sword<WG4501> of my<WG3450> mouth. <WG4750>

He that hath<WG2192> an ear,<WG3775> let him hear<WG191> what<WG5101> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> saith<WG3004> unto the<WG3588> churches;<WG1577> To him<WG846> that overcometh<WG3528> will I give<WG1325> to eat<WG5315> of<WG575> the<WG3588> hidden <WG2928> <WG3588> manna, <WG3131> and<WG2532> will give<WG1325> him<WG846> a white<WG3022> stone,<WG5586> and<WG2532> in<WG1909> the<WG3588> stone<WG5586> a new<WG2537> name<WG3686> written,<WG1125> which<WG3739> no man<WG3762> knoweth<WG1097> saving<WG1508> he that receiveth<WG2983> it.

And <WG2532> unto the<WG3588> angel<WG32> of the<WG3588> church<WG1577> in<WG1722> Thyatira<WG2363> write;<WG1125> These things<WG3592> saith<WG3004> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> who hath<WG2192> his<WG848> eyes<WG3788> like unto<WG5613> a flame<WG5395> of fire,<WG4442> and<WG2532> his<WG848> feet<WG4228> are like<WG3664> fine brass; <WG5474>

I know<WG1492> thy<WG4675> works,<WG2041> and<WG2532> charity,<WG26> and<WG2532> service,<WG1248> and<WG2532> faith,<WG4102> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> patience,<WG5281> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> works;<WG2041> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> last<WG2078> to be more<WG4119> than the<WG3588> first. <WG4413>

Notwithstanding <WG235> I have<WG2192> a few things<WG3641> against<WG2596> thee,<WG4675> because<WG3754> thou sufferest<WG1439> that woman<WG1135> Jezebel,<WG2403> which calleth<WG3004> herself<WG1438> a prophetess,<WG4398> to teach<WG1321> and<WG2532> to seduce<WG4105> my<WG1699> servants<WG1401> to commit fornication,<WG4203> and<WG2532> to eat<WG5315> things sacrificed unto idols. <WG1494>
And <WG2532> I gave<WG1325> her<WG846> space<WG5550> to<WG2443> repent<WG3340> of<WG1537> her<WG848> fornication;<WG4202> and<WG2532> she repented<WG3340> not. <WG3756>

Behold, <WG2400> I<WG1473> will cast<WG906> her<WG846> into<WG1519> a bed,<WG2825> and<WG2532> them that commit adultery<WG3431> with<WG3326> her<WG846> into<WG1519> great<WG3173> tribulation,<WG2347> except<WG3362> they repent<WG3340> of<WG1537> their<WG848> deeds. <WG2041>

And <WG2532> I will kill<WG615> her<WG848> children<WG5043> with<WG1722> death;<WG2288> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> churches<WG1577> shall know<WG1097> that<WG3754> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> he which searcheth<WG2045> the reins<WG3510> and<WG2532> hearts: <WG2588> and<WG2532> I will give<WG1325> unto every one<WG1538> of you<WG5213> according<WG2596> to your<WG5216> works. <WG2041>

But <WG1161> unto you<WG5213> I say,<WG3004> and<WG2532> unto the rest<WG3062> in<WG1722> Thyatira,<WG2363> as many as<WG3745> have<WG2192> not<WG3756> this<WG5026> doctrine,<WG1322> and<WG2532> which<WG3748> have not<WG3756> known<WG1097> the<WG3588> depths<WG899> of Satan,<WG4567> as<WG5613> they speak;<WG3004> I will put<WG906> upon<WG1909> you<WG5209> none<WG3756> other<WG243> burden. <WG922>
But <WG4133> that which<WG3739> ye have<WG2192> already hold fast<WG2902> till <WG891> <WG3757> I come. <WG2240> <WG302>

And <WG2532> he that overcometh,<WG3528> and<WG2532> keepeth<WG5083> my<WG3450> works<WG2041> unto<WG891> the end,<WG5056> to him<WG846> will I give<WG1325> power<WG1849> over<WG1909> the<WG3588> nations: <WG1484>

And <WG2532> he shall rule<WG4165> them<WG846> with<WG1722> a rod<WG4464> of iron;<WG4603> as<WG5613> the<WG3588> vessels<WG4632> of a potter<WG2764> shall they be broken to shivers: <WG4937> even as<WG5613> I<WG2504> received<WG2983> of<WG3844> my<WG3450> Father. <WG3962>
And <WG2532> I will give<WG1325> him<WG846> the<WG3588> morning<WG4407> star. <WG792>
He that hath<WG2192> an ear,<WG3775> let him hear<WG191> what<WG5101> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> saith<WG3004> unto the<WG3588> churches. <WG1577>
